page.title: 12FOOTBALL
page.content: From the survey we carried out within the school we found out that Sheffield Wednesday was the most popular Soccer team for Youngsters to support.A few people chose Tottenham Hotspur,and a few chose Chesterfield.All the people who go to soccer matches only go to home games.Everybody agreed that the soccer violence shown on TV at the match between Juventus & Liverpool was disgusting.They also agree that the ban on English Clubs is unfair.They think that to stop soccer violence they will either have to ban crowds or use close circuit TV cameras.We think that soccer violence will get worse in years to come unless somebody takes very serious action soon.The minority of the crowds are giving English Soccer a very bad reputation. By B.Wright & C.Brown 2D1
